questiontext.text:
1      #include <iostream>
2      int func(int a, int b) {
3          int c = -30;
4          int result = b * a;
5          return result;
6      }
7      int main() {
8          int a = 51;
9          int b = 61;
10          std::cout << "result: " << func(a,b) << "\n";
11          return 0;
12      }


Введите ответ программы result:

1      #include <iostream>
2      int main() {
3          int a = 49;
4          int b = 69;
5          if (a == b)
6      	std::cout << "The numbers are equal" << "\n";
7          else
8      	std::cout << "The numbers are not equal" << "\n";
9          return 0;
10      }


Введите ответ программы:

1      #include <iostream>
2      #include <cmath>
3      int main() {
4          double a = 32;
5          double b = -43;
6          double c = -46;
7          double x1, x2;
8          if ((b*b - 4*a*c) >= 0) {
9              x1 = (-1*b + sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
10              std::cout << "x1: " << x1 << "\n";
11              x2 = (-1*b - sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
12              std::cout << "x2: " << x2 << "\n";
13          }
14          else {
15              std::cout << "The discriminant is less than 0" << "\n";
16          }
17          return 0;
18      }


При компиляции программы результат будет: 3
